I don't know how many of you tape the games like I do, but I also watch them 2 or 3 times during the week before the next game. I'm telling you. Robertson is the best left back in the world. He is everywhere, all the time, doing everything, all the time, everywhere, doing everything all the time, everywhere. He is absolutely insane. I am a striker at heart in the beer leagues, but he is probably one of the only defenders I ever liked, and I don't just like him, I LOVE HIM!!!!!!!!
Freaking awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

P.S. I only watch the wins, I can't stomach to watch our losses.

replies.msg:
Sadio Mane has passed to Mo Salah 16 times this season, with Salah returning the compliment on 20 occasions.

READ MORE
Why Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp turned down Man City's All or Nothing series
But more significantly Salah has been the third most frequent recipient of Mane passes this season.

Given that Mane operates predominantly down the left, it is no surprise that his most popular passing recipient is Andy Robertson, who has received 26 passes. James Milner is next with 22, then Salah.

Interestingly Roberto Firmino - the fulcrum of the Reds attacking axis, has found Sadio Mane with 16 passes this season, but Mo Salah 23 times.
